name: Ready. Aim. Golf.
description:
-- Play in Fullscreen for optimal experience --

This is my first game ever.

I've made it in Unity in 2 weeks. Not fulltime but in the evenings after work. It is still very rough around the edges and I would rather call it a prototype or demo.

Tiles are are just 3 colors - nothing fancy, Flags and Birds are still in pixel art, the Level End Zone ist just a green color, UI is functional but not pretty, Soundtrack and End of Game Sound are not made by myself.

There is a ton of features that I would like to add, if I would ever turn this into a fully fledged game.

I hope you have fun trying out the 25 levels.

I appreciate any kind of constructive feedback :)

kebstrr
